Reference

All functions

download_img_data()

Download T1 and T2 data

get.deriv.smooth.hist()

Gets $n^th$ derivative of smoothed histogram

get.first.mode()

Get First Peak

get.largest.mode()

Grab largest peak

get.last.mode()

Get Last Peak

make_img_voi()

Make Image VOI

s.hist

Smoothed histogram of image

smooth_hist()

Histogram smoothing for whitestripe

t1.voi.hist

Histogram of VOI of T1 template image

t2.voi.hist

Histogram of VOI of T2 template image

whitestripe()

Performs White Stripe of T1 or T2 Images

whitestripe_hybrid()

Hybrid WhiteStripe

whitestripe_ind_to_mask()

WhiteStripe Indices to Mask

whitestripe_norm()

Normalize Image using white stripe

ws_img_data()

Return Filenames of T1 and T2 data

xvals

Midpoints from VOI histogram
